caption:
This photograph captures a bustling urban scene focused on a busy toll bridge. It appears to be either early morning or late afternoon, as the lighting is soft and has a warm hue, suggesting the sun might be low in the sky. The bridge is packed with numerous vehicles, suggesting a peak traffic hour.

In the foreground, we see a toll booth with barriers and red traffic signals, indicating the cars are waiting to pay or pass through. The toll booth has a numerical indicator (marked "2"), likely displaying the lane number. The cars exhibit a wide variety of models and sizes, tightly packed in a gridlock.

The composition leads the viewer's eye towards the towering structures of the bridge in the background, which emerge through a slightly hazy atmosphere. The sheer number of cars, alongside the grandeur of the bridge and the mellow lighting, together create a dynamic scene capturing the essence of daily city commute and infrastructure.
title: Walt whitman bridge crosses the Delaware river at south Philadelphia, leads to New Jersey suburbs
